Descriptions.Text:
Call upon the Light and become an avatar of retribution, increasing your critical strike chance by {1}% for {2} sec.

{FFFFFFFF|Combines with other Avenging Wrath abilities.}

Call upon the Light and become an avatar of retribution for {1} sec, causing Judgment to generate {2} additional Holy Power.

Combines with Avenging Wrath.
Returns all dead party members to life with {1}% of maximum health and mana.  Cannot be cast when in combat.
Critical Strike damage of your abilities increased by {1}% and Hammer of Wrath critical strikes cause a Blessed Hammer to spiral outward dealing {2} Holystrike damage to enemies.

Stamina increased by {1}%.

Armor increased by {2}%.
Divine Protection reduces damage you take by an additional {1}% and Shield of Vengeance absorbs {2}% more damage.
After you spend {1} Holy Power, your next Word of Glory echoes onto a nearby ally at {2}% effectiveness

Reduces all damage you take by {1}% for {2} sec.

While Ardent Defender is active, the next attack that would otherwise kill you will instead bring you to {3}% of your maximum health.
Your auto attacks have a {1}% chance to reset the cooldown of Blade of Justice.
Empowers your chosen aura for {1} sec.

When you or allies within your Aura are critically struck, gain Reckoning. Gain {1} additional stack if you are the victim.

At {2} stacks of Reckoning, your next Judgment deals {3}% increased damage, will critically strike, and activates Avenging Wrath for {4} sec.

When you or allies within your Aura are critically struck, gain Reckoning. Gain {1} additional stack if you are the victim.

At {2} stacks of Reckoning, your next weapon swing deals {3}% increased damage, will critically strike, and activates Avenging Wrath for {4} sec.

Learn Retribution Aura and Crusader Aura:

|T135889:24|t {ffffffff|Retribution Aura}:
When any party or raid member within {1} yds takes more than {2}% of their health in damage in a single hit, each member gains {3}% increased damage and healing, decaying over {4} sec. This cannot occur within {5} sec of the aura being applied.

|T135890:24|t {ffffffff|Crusader Aura}:
Increases mounted speed by {6}% for all party and raid members within {7} yds.

Learn Concentration Aura and Devotion Aura:

|T135933:24|t{ffffffff|Concentration Aura}:
Interrupt and Silence effects on party and raid members within {1} yds are {2}% shorter. 

|T135893:24|t {ffffffff|Devotion Aura}:
Party and raid members within {3} yds are bolstered by their devotion, reducing damage taken by {4}%.

Hurls your shield at an enemy target, dealing {1} Holy damage, interrupting and silencing the non-Player target for {2} sec, and then jumping to {3} additional nearby enemies. 

Shields you for {4} sec, absorbing {5}% as much damage as it dealt.

Deals {6} additional damage to all enemies within {7} yds of each target hit.

You become the ultimate crusader of light for {1} sec. Crusader Strike and Judgment cool down {2}% faster and heal up to {3} injured allies for {4}% of the damage they deal.

If Avenging Wrath is known, also increases Judgment, Crusader Strike, and auto-attack damage by {5}%.
When you heal with Holy Light, all enemies within {1} yards of the target take Holy damage equal to {2}% of the amount healed.

Call upon the Light to become an avatar of retribution, reducing Holy Shock's cooldown by {1}%, allowing Hammer of Wrath to be used on any target, increasing your damage and healing by {2}% for {3} sec.
Call upon the Light to become an avatar of retribution, allowing Hammer of Wrath to be used on any target, increasing your damage, healing and critical strike chance by {1}% for {2} sec.

Call upon the Light and become an avatar of retribution, increasing your damage and healing done by {1}% for {2} sec, and allowing Hammer of Wrath to be cast on any target.

Combines with other Avenging Wrath abilities, granting all known Avenging Wrath effects while active.
Word of Glory and Light of Dawn have a {1}% chance to grant you Avenging Wrath for {2} sec.
When you use Avenger's Shield, your block chance is increased by {1}% for {2} sec.

Imbue a friendly target with a Barrier of Faith, absorbing {1} damage for {2} sec. For the next {3} sec, Barrier of Faith accumulates {4}% of effective healing from your Flash of Light or Holy Light spells. Every {5} sec, the accumulated healing becomes an absorb shield.
Your next {1} casts of Shield of the Righteous or Word of Glory cost no Holy Power.
Mark a second target as a Beacon, mimicking the effects of Beacon of Light. Your heals will now heal both of your Beacons, but at {1}% reduced effectiveness.
Wrap a single ally in holy energy, causing your heals on other party or raid members to also heal that ally for {1}% of the amount healed.

Apply a Beacon of Light to your target and {1} injured allies within {2} yds for {3} sec.

All affected allies will be healed for {4}% of the amount of your other healing done. Your Flash of Light and Holy Light on these targets will also grant {5} Holy Power.

Begin mending the wounds of a friendly target, healing them for {1} after {2} sec.

{FFFFFFFF|Generates {3} Holy Power upon healing.}

Pierce an enemy with a blade of light, dealing {1} Holy damage.

{FFFFFFFF|Generates {2} Holy Power.}

Blade of Justice now hits nearby enemies for {1} Holy damage. 

Deals reduced damage beyond {2} targets.
Crusader Strike, Judgment, Hammer of Wrath and your damaging single target Holy Power abilities deal Holystrike damage.
Crusader Strike and Judgment hit an additional {1} targets but deal {2}% reduced damage to secondary targets.

Throws a Blessed Hammer that spirals outward, dealing {1} Holy damage to enemies and reducing the next damage they deal to you by {2}.

|cFFFFFFFFGenerates {3} Holy Power.
Your Blessing of Protection and Blessing of Freedom spells now have {1} additional charge.
Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to movement impairing effects for {1} sec.

Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to Physical damage and harmful effects for {1} sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for {2} sec.

Shares a cooldown with Blessing of Spellwarding.

Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to Physical damage and harmful effects for {1} sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for {2} sec.

Blesses a party or raid member, reducing their damage taken by {1}%, but you suffer {2}% of damage prevented.

Last {3} sec, or until transferred damage would cause you to fall below {4}% health.
Instantly removes all stun, silence, fear and horror effects from the friendly target and reduces the duration of future such effects by {1}% for {2} sec.

Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to magical damage and harmful effects for {1} sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for {2} sec.

Shares a cooldown with Blessing of Protection.

Bless an ally for {1} sec, causing their attacks to have a {2}% chance to deal {3}% additional damage as Holy.

{FFFFFFFF|Blessing of the Seasons:} Turns to Autumn after use.
Emits dazzling light in all directions, blinding enemies within {1} yds, causing them to wander disoriented for {2} sec. Non-Holy damage will break the disorient effect.
Judgment generates {1} additional Holy Power.

Casting Flash of Light on targets affected by Tyr's Deliverance extends the duration of your Tyr's Deliverance by {1} sec.

Casting Holy Light on targets affected by Tyr's Deliverance extends the duration of your Tyr's Deliverance by {2} sec.

Tyr's Deliverance can be extended up to a maximum of {3} sec.
Increases the range of Light of Dawn to {1} yds.
Avenger's Shield also shields you for {1} sec, absorbing {2}% as much damage as it dealt, up to {3}% of your maximum health.
Avenger's Shield increases the damage of your next Shield of the Righteous by {1}% for each target hit by Avenger's Shield, stacking up to {2} times, and increases its radius by {3} yds.
Divine Storm, Divine Hammer and Consecration now deal Radiant damage and your abilities that deal Radiant damage deal {1}% increased damage.
Divine Steed now has {1} charges.
Cleanses a friendly target, removing all Poison, Disease, and Magic effects.

When you dispel an ally within your aura, all allies within your aura are dispelled of the same effect.

Healing allies with your Holy Light will cleanse all Diseases and Poisons from the target.
Cleanses a friendly target, removing all Poison and Disease effects.
Beacon of Light transfers an additional {1}% of the amount healed.
Interrupt and Silence effects on party and raid members within {1} yds are {2}% shorter.

Blade of Justice casts Consecration at the target's location.

This effect can only occur every {1} sec.

Your Consecration is {1}% larger, and enemies within it have {2}% reduced movement speed.

Your Divine Hammer is {3}% larger, and enemies within them have {4}% reduced movement speed.
Consecrates the land beneath you, causing {1} Holy damage over {2} sec to enemies who enter the area. Limit {3}.
Consecrates the land beneath you, causing {1} Holy damage over {2} sec to enemies who enter the area and reducing their movement speed by {3}%. Limit {4}.
Consecration lasts {1} sec longer and its damage is increased by {2}%.
Allows you a moment of peace as you kneel in quiet contemplation to ponder the nature of the Light.

Call upon the Light and begin a crusade, increasing your haste by {1}% for {2} sec.

Each Holy Power spent during Crusade increases haste by an additional {3}%.

Maximum {4} stacks.

If {ffffffff|Avenging Wrath} is known, also grants {5}% damage per stack.
Increases mounted speed by {1}% for all party and raid members within {2} yds.

Strike the target for {1} Physical damage.

|cFFFFFFFFGenerates {2} Holy Power.
Judgment now has {1} charges, and Grand Crusader now also reduces the cooldown of Judgment by {2} sec.
Crusader Strike reduces the cooldown of Holy Shock by {1} sec.
Increases the range of your Crusader Strike, Rebuke and auto-attacks by {1} yds. Using Crusader Strike heals you for {2}% of your maximum health.
Increases the range of your Crusader Strike, Rebuke and auto-attacks by {1} yds. Using Blessed Hammer heals you for {2}% of your maximum health.
Enemies hit by Avenger's Shield deal {1}% reduced damage to you for {2} sec. Multiple applications may overlap, up to a maximum of {3}.

Crusader Strike replaces your auto-attacks and deals {1} Physical damage, but now only generates {2} Holy Power every {3} attacks.

Inherits Crusader Strike benefits but cannot benefit from Windfury.
Every {1} sec the healing done by your next Light of Dawn is increased by {2}%. Stacks up to {3} times.
Party and raid members within {1} yds are bolstered by their devotion, reducing damage taken by {2}%.

Abilities that deal Holystrike damage deal {1}% increased damage and casting abilities that deal Holystrike damage grants you a stack of Divine Arbiter.

At {2} stacks your next damaging single target Holy Power ability causes {3} Holystrike damage to your primary target and {4} Holystrike damage to enemies within {5} yds.
Final Reckoning and Execution Sentence grant {1} Holy Power.
The healing of your next Holy Light or Flash of Light is increased by {1}% and its cast time is reduced by {2}%.
Holy Shock has a {1}% increased critical strike chance.
Divine Hammers spin around you, damaging enemies within {1} yds for {2} Radiant damage over {3} sec. Deals reduced damage beyond {4} targets.
Holy Shock's healing and damage is increased by {1}%.
Reduces all damage you take by {1}% for {2} sec. Usable while stunned.
Holy Power abilities have a {1}% chance to make your next Holy Power ability free and deal {2}% increased damage and healing.

After casting Divine Toll, you instantly cast Judgment every {1} sec for {2} sec.
After casting Divine Toll, you instantly cast Avenger's Shield every {1} sec for {2} sec.
While empowered by Infusion of Light, Flash of Light heals for an additional {1}%, and Holy Light refunds {2}% of your maximum mana.

Grants immunity to all damage, harmful effects, knockbacks and forced movement effects for {1} sec. 

Cannot be used if you have Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for {2} sec.
Leap atop your Charger for {1} sec, increasing movement speed by {2}%. Usable while indoors or in combat.

Unleashes a whirl of divine energy, dealing {1} Radiant damage to all nearby enemies. 

Deals reduced damage beyond {2} targets.
Instantly cast Holy Shock on up to {1} targets within {2} yds.

Instantly cast Avenger's Shield on up to {1} targets within {2} yds.

After casting Divine Toll, you instantly cast Avenger's Shield every {3} sec. This effect lasts {4} sec.

Generates {5} Holy Power per target hit.

Instantly cast Judgment on up to {1} targets within {2} yds.

Divine Toll's Judgment deals {3}% increased damage.
Increases the range of your Aura by {1} yards and reduces the cooldown of Aura Mastery by {2} sec.
Increases the duration of Avenging Wrath or Crusade by {1} sec.

Blessing of Freedom increases the target's movement speed by {1}%. Blessing of Protection and Blessing of Sacrifice reduce the target's damage taken by {2}%. These effects linger for {3} sec after the Blessing ends.
Lay on Hands grants the target {1}% increased armor for {2} sec.

Judgment empowers your next Word of Glory to automatically activate Light of Dawn with {1}% increased effectiveness.

This effect can only occur every {2} sec.

Judgment empowers your next Single target Holy Power ability to automatically activate Divine Storm with {1}% increased effectiveness.

This effect can only occur every {2} sec.
Crusader Strike has a {1}% chance to make your next Divine Storm free and deal {2}% additional damage.
A hammer slowly falls from the sky upon the target, after {1} sec, they suffer {2}% of the damage taken from your abilities as Holy damage during that time.
Final Reckoning and Execution Sentence's durations are increased by {1} sec.
Your Blade of Justice causes the target to burn for {1} of the damage dealt as Radiant damage over {2} sec.
Releases a blinding flash from your shield, causing {1} Holy damage to all nearby enemies within {2} yds and reducing all damage they deal to you by {3}% for {4} sec.

Blessing of Dawn increases the damage and healing of your next Holy Power spending ability by an additional {1}%.

Unleashes a powerful weapon strike that deals {1} Holy damage to an enemy target,

Expends a large amount of mana to quickly heal a friendly target for {1}.
When Avenger's Shield strikes a single enemy, it deals {1}% additional Holy damage.

Each enemy hit by Avenger's Shield reduces the remaining cooldown on Guardian of Ancient Kings by {1} sec.

When you drop below {2}% health, you become infused with Guardian of Ancient Kings for {3} sec. This cannot occur again for {4} sec.

Holy Shock leaves a Glimmer of Light on the target for {1} sec.  When you Holy Shock, all targets with Glimmer of Light are damaged for {2} or healed for {3}.

You may have Glimmer of Light on up to {4} targets.
Consecration heals you and {1} allies within it for {2} every {3} sec.

Judgment causes the target to take {1}% increased damage from your next Holy Power ability.

Empowers you with the spirit of ancient kings, reducing all damage you take by {1}% for {2} sec.
Empowers the friendly target with the spirit of the forgotten queen, causing the target to be immune to all damage for {1} sec.

When your health is brought below {1}%, you instantly cast a free Word of Glory at {2}% effectiveness on yourself.

Cannot occur more than once every {3} sec.

Stuns the target for {1} sec.

Hammers the current target for {1} Physical damage.

|cFFFFFFFFGenerates {3} Holy Power.
Commands the attention of an enemy target, forcing them to attack you.

Armor and critical strike chance increased by {1}%.

An efficient spell, healing a friendly target for {1}.

Fires a beam of light that scatters to strike a clump of targets. 

If the beam is aimed at an enemy target, it deals {1} Holy damage and radiates {2} healing to {3} allies within {4} yds.

If the beam is aimed at a friendly target, it heals for {5} and radiates {6} Holy damage to {7} enemies within {8} yds.
Your block chance is increased by {1}%, you are able to block spells, and your successful blocks deal {2} Holy damage to your attacker.

Triggers a burst of Light on the target, dealing {1} Holy damage to an enemy, or {2} healing to an ally.  Has an additional {3}% critical strike chance.

Every {1} sec, gain {2}% increased damage to your next Divine Storm, stacking up to {3} times.
